series_title: Application Documentation: Unsuccessful Loans and Credit Certificates
series_description: This series documents the loan applications and non-VHDAloan mortgage credit certificates (MCC) that were not by VHDA, the lender, or that were cancelled by the buyer. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications and correspondence

series_title: Automated Clearing House Authorization Forms and Correspondence
series_description: This series documents the mortgage borrower's signed authorization forms for electronic transfer of mortgage from his or her financial institution. This series may include, is not limited to forms and correspondence for changes to authorization
This series documents the original signed borrower's note.

This series documents the provision, verification, and/or of loan data received from borrowers, insurance companies, taxing localities, and other outside companies in response to requests and other inquiries. This series may include, but is limited to: audit reviews, subordination agreement, assumptions, mitigation loss, returned mail W-9, agreement, 1099-C form, Privacy Act authorization and inspection.
This series documents mortgage loans that were foreclosed or defaulted on. This series may include but is not limited to: foreclosure checklist, certified letters, and copy of Deed of Trust.
This series documents the original deed of trust needed for satisfaction of the loan.

This series documents a lender’s participation, compliance, performance in VHDA loan programs and includes VHDA’s determination of the lender as an active or inactive participant. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, financial statements, name changes, copies of lender with VHDA, proof of insurance coverage, and correspondence.

series_title: Mortgage Credit Certificate (MCC) Files: Non-VHDA Loans
series_description: This series documents the issuance of mortgage credit certificates (MCC) to borrowers in connection with loans not provided by the Agency. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications and closing documentation.

This series documents monthly customer coupons used for posting mortgage payments to the correct loan account. This series may include, but is not limited to: monthly customer coupons and payments submitted by the borrower.
This series documents loans made through the Division. This series may include, but is not limited to: the complete origination, underwriting, and closing documentation for each loan.

This series documents the payoff packets sent to the borrower that are returned by mail to VHDA as undeliverable. This may include, but is not limited to: original deed of trust, original borrower's note, and a certificate of satisfaction showing the loan has been fully settled.

Documents This series documents the payoff of mortgage loans. This may include, but is not limited to: copy of certificate of satisfaction, copy of the payoff check, and correspondence related to the payoff.

This series documents the repurchased loans by lenders due a regulation violation or early default by the borrower. This series may include, but is not limited to: mortgage loans originated by an outside lender.
This series documents the property tax notifications of properties for which VHDA holds the mortgage. This series include, but is not limited to: tax bill notifications

This series documents overpayments of real estate taxes to individual taxing localities. This series may include, but is not limited to: copies of refund checks, correspondence with treasurer's office, and customer information/correspondence regarding the refund check.
